div.pre: 1385 Gemene, GÃ¼ndogu near Tokat (anc. Dazimon), Pontus, 1967 Burial: c. 75 B.C. (Pfeiler) Contents: 252 AE Amasia: 1 Amisus: 190 Cabeira: 4 Chabacta: 1 Comana: 7 Amastris: 21 Sinope: 27 Unc. mint: 1 Disposition: Ankara (inv. no. 1730) Information from Saadet Taner The dating rests on the fact that the latest substantial issue of Amisus (Dionysus/ cista mystica) is not represented
